meanings: beautiful, gorgeous, lovely, pretty; (경치·건물 등이) picturesque

examples.korean: The scene was one of breathtaking beauty. 발음듣기 그 장면은 숨 막히게 아름다운 모습이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The scene was one of breathtaking beauty. 발음

examples.korean: He glimpsed Sonia, resplendent in a red dress. 발음듣기 그는 빨간 드레스를 입은, 눈부시게 아름다운 소냐를 흘끗 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He glimpsed Sonia, resplendent in a red dress. 발음

examples.korean: The hotel was in a beautiful position amid lemon groves. 발음듣기 그 호텔은 레몬 나무숲으로 둘러싸인 아름다운 위치에 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hotel was in a beautiful position amid lemon groves. 발음

examples.korean: a beautiful starry night 발음듣기 별이 총총한 아름다운 밤하늘 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
indescribably beautiful / boring 발음듣기 형언할 수 없이 아름다운/말도 못 하게 지루한 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
